name: Banana Gear Rising: Revengeance
description:
This game was submitted for the Gorilla Jam hosted by Go Ria.

Challenges:
 - For this game, we only used mouse controls.
 - All sounds and music are 100% voice recordings with effects.

Gameplay:
This is an infinite runner style game.  Kill fruits to gain points and fill the juice meter.  When the juice meter is filled, the next wave of enemies will begin.  If ten enemies get past, it's game over!  Health is shown via naked banana on the top of the screen.  Progress is saved after each wave. 

Controls:
Left Mouse - Attack Low
Right Mouse - Attack High
Hold Either Button - All Consuming Special Attack

Lore:
This is the origin story of the Peanut Butter Jelly Time Banana, in memory of the Golden Age of the Internet.   As the story was told to my great, great grandmother by the village elder, the banana was partying late at night with their gorilla best friend, Gorilla, when a gang of sour-faced fruits swarmed in and ran off with him.  Their mind filled with bloody revengeance, the banana pursued the juicy culprits, swearing by their very banana slices that they wouldn't let a single one escape!
